content: Amrita Srivastava Manager Business Innovation Noida, Uttar Pradesh amritasrivastava68_7p2@indeedemail.com +91-9810262151 Agile Methodology / Scrum Master with nearly 17 years of experience in Project Management, Software Development& Support. Skilled at managing various technical aspects like software design, coding of modules, monitoring critical paths & taking appropriate actions. Sound understanding of the SDLC with proficiency in mapping business requirements, technical documentation, application design & development, testing & troubleshooting of applications. Proficiency in mapping business requirements, technical documentation, application development, integration and troubleshooting of applications. Areas of excellence include: Process Design & Implementation, Systems Analysis & Design, Maintenance and Support. Expertise in end-to-end implementation of various projects including, coding of software applications. Well versed with project management policies & guidelines and development methodologies. Adept in providing end-to-end support for software products/projects from inception, requirement specs, planning, designing, implementation, configuration management, testing, documentation and closure. A technocrat with hands-on experience in leading teams for successful project implementation while ensuring a high-quality customer experience, elevating customer satisfaction in line with SLAs & work process. A proactive planner with excellent interpersonal, problem solving, time management and analytical skills. Work Experience Manager Business Innovation NetEdge Computing July 2019 to Present AS a Manager Business Innovation I am involved with requirement gathering, analysis, designing, preparing business requirement documents, Wire Framing, CRM Implementation, JIRA implementation , Managing team , writing proposals, Effort Estimation etc. Principal IT Consultant Cloudmynds March 2018 to May 2019 Principal IT Consultant Verto Bizserv - Delhi, Delhi April 2017 to March 2018 Project Manager D C Web Services Pvt. Ltd January 2014 to March 2017 Team Lead CRIS - Railway Ministry - Delhi, Delhi May 2013 to October 2013 Project Manager/Business Analyst Amvrin Systems Private Limited April 2012 to March 2013 Project Lead Adapt Software Private Limited - Gurgaon, Haryana December 2007 to December 2008 System Analyst 3G Soft Solutions Private Limited - Noida, Uttar Pradesh January 2005 to December 2007 System Analyst IRIS Software Private Limited - Delhi, Delhi September 2000 to October 2002 Software Engineer cum Project Leader Metamor Global Solutions Limited - Noida, Uttar Pradesh August 1996 to September 2000 Software Engineer ESQ Business Service - Noida, Uttar Pradesh August 1995 to August 1996 Key Result Areas: Project Management Managing end-to-end application development projects from conceptualization to technology mapping and final execution of the same Handling various technical aspects like project documentation, system design & integration, coding of modules, monitoring critical paths & taking appropriate actions for multiple projects SDLC Planning & Management Directing software development activities for business process, mapping of the client and identifying appropriate development methodology Handling client / user / partner interaction for requirement gathering, risk assessment, finalization of technical specifications and discussing for effort/cost/time estimation Application Maintenance & Support Troubleshooting problems pertaining to the server administration, application conflicts and system bugs Overseeing smooth implementation of project & extending post-implementation, application maintenance and technical support Client Relationship Management Monitoring and ensuring customer delivery during the transition period Building and maintaining healthy business relations with clients and ensuring high customer satisfaction matrices by achieving delivery & service quality norms Accomplishments: Defined processes and tools best suited to each project. Moved between agile and waterfall approaches depending on project specifics and client goals, creating detailed project road maps, plans, schedules and work breakdown structures. Led teams across broad technical, financial and business disciplines. Focused teams on business objectives and tracked progress to ensure project milestones were completed on time, on budget and with the desired results. Mitigated risk factors through careful analysis of financial and statistical data. Anticipated and managed change effectively in rapidly evolving global business environments. Refer annexure for detail of projects handled Education Bachelor of Science DAV Degree College - Roorkee, Uttarakhand 1991 Skills / IT Skills INTEGRATION (1 year) INTEGRATOR (1 year) MAINTENANCE (1 year) PROJECT MANAGEMENT (1 year) REQUIREMENT GATHERING (1 year) C/C++ C# Visual Studio .NET Framework Online Profile https://www.linkedin.com/home?trk=nav_responsive_tab_home Additional Information Core Competencies ~Project Management ~Software Design & Development ~Technical& Testing Support ~System Design & Integration ~Escalation / Conflict Management ~Liaison & Coordination ~Resource Management ~Requirement Gathering ~Application Maintenance IT Skills Well versed with: https://www.linkedin.com/home?trk=nav_responsive_tab_home Project Management Tools: MS Project, MS Visio, MS Office, Waterfall and Agile techs Front End Tools: ASP.net, Visual Basic 6.0, Power Builder 4.0 and Visual Studio 2005 Operating Systems: Windows 95 and MS-Dos 6.2 Databases: SQL Server, Analysis Services, Reporting Services, Business Intelligence (BI) and Microsoft Access 2000 Utilities: Lotus Notes, Crystal Reports 7.0, Performance Point Server 2007, SQL Server and Reporting Services Languages: C#, C++, C and Pascal
